divs: Sighting Detailswe were looking at the stars at about nine oclock. there was one bright light in the middile of the big dipper. we thought it was a satellite. then the light split into two and bothed moved along a parallel path. they were a reddish pink and slowly dissapeared.
Summary: {dr}a light that split into two then both moved along a parelel path then slowly dissapeared.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Heber City
There were no other sightings in Heber City on or around April 2nd 2013
